); } "}]}]}]," ",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"use-variables-in-the-title","children":"在标题中使用变量 "}]," ",["$r","p",null,{"children":[["$r","code",null,{"children":""}]," 组件的子元素必须是单个文本字符串（或者是单个数字或带有 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"toString"}]," 方法的单个对象）。可能并不明显，但这样使用 JSX 大括号是存在问题的："]}]," ",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-js","children":"<title>Results page {pageNumber} // 🔴 问题：这不是单个字符串 "}]}]," ",["$r","p",null,{"children":["……实际上会导致 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":""}]," 组件的子元素是一个包含两个元素的数组（字符串 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":""Results page""}]," 和 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"pageNumber"}]," 的值）。这将导致错误，应该使用字符串插值传递给 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"<title>"}]," 一个单个字符串："]}]," ",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-js","children":"<title>{`Results page ${pageNumber}`} "}]}]]}]]
